title: Calories in McDonald's Medium Chips
meta_description: Discover calories in McDonald's medium chips, plus full nutrition breakdown including carbs, fat, protein, sodium, and quick tweaks for variations.
assumptions: McDonald's medium portion french fries (chips), salted, fried in vegetable oil blend, standard serving size (~117g).
disclaimer: Nutrition varies by location, recipe changes, portion size, and customizations; check McDonald's app or site for latest values.

quick_answer.text: McDonald's medium chips contain about 340 calories with 44g carbs and 16g fat.

label_note: Totals mirror Nutrition Facts fields for easy comparison with packaging.

faqs.q: How many calories in McDonald's medium chips?
What are the carbs in McDonald's medium chips?
faqs.a: About 44g total carbs, including 4g fiber and 0g sugars.

faqs.q: How much fat is in McDonald's medium chips?
Are McDonald's medium chips high in sodium?
faqs.a: Yes, around 260mg sodium per serving due to salting.

faqs.q: How do small vs medium McDonald's chips compare in calories?
faqs.a: Small has ~230 calories; medium adds about 110 more.
